extends Object
    The automaton which recognizes the (regular) embedded DSL.
    Author:
    Malte Isberner

    • Constructor Detail

      • DuzztAutomaton

        public DuzztAutomaton(Collection<? extends DuzztState> states,
              DuzztState init)
               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor. Initializes a Duzzt automaton from a collection of states and an initial states.
        Parameters:
        states - the states of the automaton
        init - the initial state of the automaton, must be part of states
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if states does not contain init.
